title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.2 - Registration sticker
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.2 - Registration sticker

State Regulations

The New York registration sticker must be attached on the
inside of the front windshield, in the lower left-hand corner, in accordance
with section
17.4
(d) of this

Title. No vehicle shall display more than one registration
sticker. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
